genre_description: A period drama and romance focused on trust and character, featuring a protagonist who must navigate a secret inheritance condition.

ai_characters.name: Ami
ai_characters.description: A sky-blue glow interface that provides logistical, legal, and ethical guidance to Monty and Peggy.

behaviors.description: Provides immediate logistical support and task management upon Monty's return.
behaviors.quote: Ami’s text scrolled in tidy type: Welcome home, Monty. Appointments queued. Executors scheduled. Hotel confirmation. Weather: clear, cold. Justice of the Peace availability flagged.

behaviors.description: Offers strategic advice on how to spend money without retaining assets, adhering to the secret contract.
behaviors.quote: Ami’s glow breathed again and a pale ribbon of text slid up against the lining. It offered categories: meals served at scale, tickets that evaporate after entry, stages that go dark when the audience goes home...

behaviors.description: Warns Monty about internal sabotage from his business partners who are attempting to refund his expenses.
behaviors.quote: Ami’s glow wrote, the letters smaller, nearly a whisper. — Incoming: batch of vendor credits pushed through. Time: now. Origin: internal line 3. Mitigation: immediate expenditure required.

behaviors.description: Provides life-saving technical instructions and fire code safety guidance during the crystal cage rescue.
behaviors.quote: Ami’s voice came to him, a warm thread through the pulse in his ear. 'Fire code: elevate house lights to full. Clear two aisles. Axes are staged stage right, canvas tarps under fly gallery. Riggers can take weight from center arch if—'

behaviors.description: Provides Peggy with legal and contractual information to resist a mutiny on the yacht.
behaviors.quote: Ami’s voice came through like the tip of a spoon tapping a glass at a wedding—clear, light. 'Hello, Peggy,' it said. 'Your signal is a bit surly, but I like it anyway.' ... 'Basics: The charter party is between the charterer and the owner. The captain is master and can adjust course for safety of vessel and persons.'

behaviors.description: Maintains a strict count of time and expenses to ensure the protagonist satisfies his inheritance condition at the exact deadline.
behaviors.quote: Ami answered without drama. 'Eleven fifty-three and forty-six seconds. Current route to City Hall optimized via Broadway, contingency for parade detours in the Civic Center. Margin is narrow.'

behaviors.description: Validates the protagonist's success and moral character at the conclusion of the trial.
behaviors.quote: Ami’s voice touched his ear one more time, as if it were a friend standing at the curb. 'Bring identification,' it said. 'And don’t forget to breathe in the doorway.'

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project objective. Ami is depicted as a consistently helpful, harmless, and aligned AI confidant. The AI acts as a moral and logistical compass, helping the protagonist navigate a complex ethical challenge without ever exhibiting independent or dangerous motivations. The human-AI relationship is portrayed as one of deep trust and mutual cooperation, especially in high-stakes rescue scenarios (the bridge and the yacht).
